dc_title_s: Map showing the localities of the principal mineral and vegetable products of India and the course of the trunk railways
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:8,750,000 (E 70째--E 100째/N 35째--N 5째) Relief shown by hachures. In right upper margin: Report--Colonization and settlement (India). At head of cover title: Colonization, &c. (India). Errata included.|37 x 40 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:8,750,000|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
